title: The Dodge Button - A Thing that is Very Possible
body:
Okay so you know how you have a Re-Roll button in your All-Random All-Middle Game? Know how you get up to 2 rolls with points you earn via the game?

Why not have a dodge button that you can charge up after playing a good number of games? More so for the Ranked usage because when a team is being made, sometimes you don't get the role you are best at and now you suddenly are in an uncomfortable position. You have played, and not been reported, for over 20 games and this one you just don't want to be the support for an AD Maokai that your team says will work because of "duo'd with the jungle" now you just hit the dodge button, boot yourself from the match without penality and take away your dodge charge. Ranked will be disabled for you for 30 seconds to ensure you don't get paired with the same people (To avoid flaming should someone recognize their name) and move on with your day.

Thoughts?

replies.body:
This gets suggested all the time.

1) People will abuse it for competitive reasons.  They'll dodge because they got counterpicked or the enemy team got an "OP" champ, not because of the reasons you outlined.  If you can use it in promos then people will dodge ANYTHING that looks even slightly bad for themselves or their team.

2) Because of #1, you have to severely limit it or Ranked matches will never start.  The most common suggestion is the one you made, getting a "free" dodge every X games played.

2a) The more "free" dodges are floating around, the more people are inclined to pull "X or feed" BS in Ranked lobbies, because they know that **someone** will dodge if nobody on the team caves to their demand.  Ironically, having **no** dodges (e.g. it randomly picks a champion for you if you don't lock in) would discourage this behavior more than having free dodges.

3) Because of #2, it's very hard to have it really be meaningful.  If you have to play 20 matches to get one dodge as you suggested -- unless you're playing for hours every day, you're going to get, like, one dodge every week or two.  You already get one "almost free" dodge per 24 hours; that wouldn't be a significant increase for most players.

People already dodge if they get counterpicked hard. So that isn't a concern.

Ranked matches take awhile to start already. So that isn't a concern.
The X or feed is exactly why Riot needs to make reporting available in Champion Select. That would fix this problem and tons of others.

I'm pretty sure he means the free one on top of the 24 hour one already in place. That way you would have some days where you could dodge more than one game without a hard penalty.
